heading: dod hooks up with wherehouse
subheading: coming soon to a wherehouse near you: burn-your-own cds at in-store digital on demand kiosks.
author: wired news report
text: digital on demand will soon share floor space with the likes of mariah carey. kiosk maker digital on demand said monday it signed a deal with record seller the wherehouse to get its custom cd machines into some of the chain's 570 stores. financial terms of the deal were not disclosed.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
